trivia_bank.question: Which musical group performs the second ending for Kill la Kill?
How many minutes long is the Kill la Kill recap episode? (Answer in decimal format)
What was the color of the candy that Hiro gave Zero Two?
Episode 17 of Darling in the FranXX aired a day before this holiday, a fitting date given the context of the episode. What is this holiday?
In the first episode of SSSS.Gridman, what is the name of the hospital Rikka takes Yuta to?
What is Yuta’s address in SSSS.Gridman?
What is the full email address Kudou gives to Andou?
What is the name of the newspaper Akko and her friends read at Luna Nova Magical Academy?
What is the last thing Kacchon says as he’s pushed down the stairs by Noriko?
What 1976 movie does the co-ed baseball team that Jackie joins heavily resemble?
The Promare share a similar name and context to this figure in Greek mythology? Who is this figure?
What is one of the names of the detective team Luluco visits on Badger Planet SVM-Z?
How many months was the defender of Jack Knife Edge Town sentenced to penal servitude for?
Studio Trigger confirmed plans to release an anime about this game on Netflix in 2022. What is the name of this game, mainly made popular by Keanu Reeves?

Currently known as the Famitsu Bunko Grand Prize, a winner from the original competition collaborated with Studio Trigger to produce an animation for his light novel. What was the number of girls in the title of his light novel?

In this Studio Trigger animation, a closeup of a uvula turns into a blossoming flower. What is the name of either one of two groups involved in this music video whose official MV is approaching 5 million views on YouTube?

Two characters shoot at each other simultaneously in a Studio Trigger animation with a name referencing the shape found on the tie of Class 3-E’s homeroom teacher. When this happens, the hand of a clock falls on a number. What is that number?

Ai Kayano and Shintarō Asanuma collaborated together in a Studio Trigger animation along with a 2-lettered music producer famous for his Hatsune Miku songs. What year was this Studio Trigger animation released?

In the sequel to the sequel to the sequel of a Studio Trigger animation, a silvery-blue haired girl with a blue bow in her hair stands in front of a red and black piano marked SV-1 on the left. Give the name of the group this animation focused on.

In an animation by Studio Trigger, one character has various objects themed after this animal in her room which she uses in her idol-esque live streams from her computer. During a live stream, she reaches 1000 viewers in under 5 minutes. What is this animal?
This Studio Trigger animation features a recipe that includes 6 potatoes, 1 zucchini, and 1 small walking mushroom. The resulting meal is the highest in which of the 7 categories shown on the screen?

This character from a Studio Trigger animation also appears in an anime produced by the Japanese animation studio Creators in Pack. This character was voiced both times by a voice actress who was one of the winners of the 11th Seiyuu Awards. What is the name of this character?
